title: Ep. 429 - Trump’s Got Your Impeachment Right Here
description:
As Democrats threaten to remove President Trump from office, the White House strikes a defiant tone and tells Democrats exactly where they can put their impeachment inquiry. We examine the President’s strategy. Then, Mitt Romney continues to be Mitt Romney, AOC wants to abolish prisons, and Justin Trudeau explains blackface to a cute little girl. Date: 10-09-2019
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
